DataSourcePortable.Name: VISITA_SEMANAL_CONTAS_TOTALIZADO
DataSourcePortable.Content:
<DataSourceDefinition> <FromSql Alias="A" SelectCommand="SELECT COUNT(A.HANDLE) VISITAS
FROM K_CRM_TAREFAUSUARIO A
JOIN K_CRM_PESSOAS B ON A.PESSOA = B.HANDLE
WHERE YEAR(A.DATACONCLUSAO) = YEAR(GETDATE())
AND MONTH(A.DATACONCLUSAO) = MONTH (GETDATE())
AND DATEPART(WEEK,A.DATACONCLUSAO) = DATEPART(WEEK,GETDATE())
AND B.FASE NOT IN (1,6)
AND A.RESPOSTA NOT IN (75)
AND A.TAREFA IN (146,249,247,28)
AND B.FILIAL IN (3,11,15,16,17)
" /> <Fields> <Field Alias="VISITAS" From="A" Path="VISITAS" /> </Fields> </DataSourceDefinition>
